mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO bizimport_trade_detail ( BizImportApplyId , BizImportFileSummaryId , PartnerTradeSeq , ProjectId , ApplyMemberId , TradeTime , TradeMoney , UserId , IsNewUser , UserCode , PhoneNumber , RegisterTime , IdTypeId , IdNumber , UserRealName , OrderApplyId , ExchangeId , CreateTime , UpdateTime , UserName ) VALUES
( #{obj.bizImportApplyId} , #{obj.bizImportFileSummaryId} , #{obj.partnerTradeSeq} , #{obj.projectId} , #{obj.applyMemberId} , #{obj.tradeTime} , #{obj.tradeMoney} , #{obj.userId} , #{obj.isNewUser} , #{obj.userCode} , #{obj.phoneNumber} , #{obj.registerTime} , #{obj.idTypeId} , #{obj.idNumber} , #{obj.userRealName} , #{obj.orderApplyId} , #{obj.exchangeId} , now() , now() , #{obj.userName} )
